title: Tristana seems very weak...
body:
Ive been playing ADC Tristana lately (new skin hype) and i'm finding that no matter what happens i'm just dealing no damage. Explosive charge does 100 at max if lucky. basic attacks do nothing and the ult seems like your shooting a pea. Am I doing something wrong??? She seems really weak compared to all the adc's in the new season. Almost every game its graves or Miss fortune and they seem to do tons of damage even when they have nothing. Does ADC tristana need a buff of some sort? If im just bad and Tristana is fine then could somebody tell me a build/skill chart for her
{{champion:18}}

replies.body:
Are you building {{item:3094}} first?

Trist is all about the Crit, not CDR so {{item:3031}}  is better than {{item:3508}} on her.

Also remember that if you coming up against tanky champions. A last Whisper or Bork are much more important than a BT.
looking at your match history you have been building Rapid Firecannon and Essence reaver... so i dont know if you a misclicking in game or misremembering. but you are not building IE.

you can play around with a lot of different builds on trist all looking to do different things, but the thing you have to keep in mind is what she's good at - demolishing towers. she's ok at cleaning up teamfights, but she's not going to dominate like a lot of the other adcs that have much better ad scaling. 

in general most ppl are building trist with {{item:3031}}{{item:3094}}{{item:3139}}{{item:3036}}{{item:3006}} (ie, cannon, merc scim, doms, zerkers) and either {{item:3072}}  or {{item:3153}}  last item. but i've seen rageblade trist, frozen mallet trist, dbl energized trist, lifesteal trist, cdr trist... you just have to know what each build actually does - cdr lets you jump around more, lifesteal is kinda bruiserish, dbl energized is going for assassination, rageblade pushes waves and towers like crazy, mallet is kinda trolly tanky trist... *shrugs*

her ult isn't used for damage, and the main purpose of her e is for damage against towers, not damage against champs.
and no, adc trist is actually one of the stronger adcs atm. she seems to do no damage compared to graves and mf because they do ridiculous amounts of damage early game, whilst trist's is mediocre.
